content: I noticed in CI of CSLib building docs on 4.26.0-rc1 a series of panics from «doc-gen4»/bibPrepass. Is anyone else seeing something similiar?
This was additionally confusing to me because the job did not fail and appears to have successfully built the docs. I only noticed because I had the log open as it was running.

Thank you for noticing this. This seems to be due to adaptations to changes to the internal Std.Internal.Parsec (which BibtexQiery uses anyway...), somewhere around here: https://github.com/dupuisf/BibtexQuery/blob/9f78601c5c3fac7f4539c172e423657feaf8c891/BibtexQuery/TexDiacritics.lean#L275

It's not immediately clear whether the problem is in core or BibtexQuery. I will investigate tomorrow if @Kim Morrison doesn't beat me to it.
Okay, I have a fix ready at https://github.com/dupuisf/BibtexQuery/pull/27; after a merge by Frédéric Dupuis the error will be gone.
